daily_analysis.reasoning: Dominant bullish structure over the last 30-50 candles (higher highs and higher lows). Price consolidated around ~3350-3450 (support) then produced a clear bullish engulfing candle at that support before the strong breakout and sustained rally — valid buy signal in an uptrend.

m30_analysis.reasoning: A clear bullish engulfing pair is visible in the mid-right area of the chart where a large green candle fully engulfs the previous red candle (wicks included). The wick-to-wick zone (pixel box given) corresponds approximately to 4,030–4,070 on the price axis. This zone does not overlap the provided daily zone (3350–3450), so inside_daily_zone is false. Confidence lowered due to image scale and exact pixel/price approximations.

errors: M30 pattern not inside Daily zone
